generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'LevelWidth'

description*.en: The "Level Width" is the uncertainty in the energy of a quantum-mechanical system having discrete energy levels in a state that is not strictly stationary. The system may be an atom, a molecule, or an atomic nucleus.

title: LevelWidth
description: The "Level Width" is the uncertainty in the energy of a quantum-mechanical system having discrete energy levels in a state that is not strictly stationary. The system may be an atom, a molecule, or an atomic nucleus.
